boardgame.name: Silent Victory: U.S. Submarines in the Pacific, 1941-45
boardgame.description: Silent Victory is a solitaire tactical level game placing you in command of an American submarine during WWII in the Pacific. Your mission is to destroy as much Japanese shipping and as many warships as possible while advancing your crew quality and decorations - all while remembering you have to make it home._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Silent Victory is purposely designed to deliver a brisk yet intensive gaming experience that forces many decisions upon you as you take command of one of the major U.S. Fleet submarine types in service. Patrols will take you to differing parts of the Pacific as time progresses in the war. The most successful commanders will be those that can manage the risks they take while prosecuting as many targets as possible._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;The game engine is built upon the successful Hunters design and has proven to be a solid, playable experience. All the major U.S. Fleet boat types are accounted for with every level of detail including period of service, armaments, crew makeup, damage capacity, and more._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Game contents will comprise:_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; One _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;frac12;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;rdquo; full-color counter sheet_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; One _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;frac34;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;rdquo; wide full-color counter sheet_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Rules booklet with designer's notes_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Five player aid cards, 2-sided_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Submarine patrol logsheet, 2-sided_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Five submarine Display Mats, 2-sided_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Eight Captain Cards_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Two Submarine Patrol Maps_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Submarine Combat Mat_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Three 6-sided, two 10-sided dice, and one 20-sided die_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Boxed_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;
boardgame.boardgamehonor: 2016 Golden Geek Best Solo Board Game Nominee

result.value: Some necessary text - easily memorized or small crib sheet
Moderate in-game text - needs crib sheet or paste ups
Extensive use of text - massive conversion needed to be playable

Brand New! LIGHT DING/DENT (see http://www.rockinbgames.com/policies/damage-classifications for more information) A portion of the earnings from each sale are donated to St. Jude Children_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s Research Hospital. Standard shipping to a contiguous USA street address: $11.99

*** With every sale we donate a percentage to the Veterans Support Foundation (including this sale). *** Wargame Depot has donated over $7,500 to this wonderful cause thanks, largely, to the wonderful Boardgamegeek community. Thank you so much for your continued support of Wargame Depot which has allowed us to give generously to the VSF. Mint, in shrink copy available. No dings, no dents, or anything wrong with the game. Non-smoking environment and kept in a humidity-controlled location. $13 shipping to US - write me for a quote to the rest of the world. I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;m the owner of Wargame Depot so a purchase from me will always be packed professionally and I can accept Paypal, MO/Check, or MC/Visa/Discover/AMEX. And if you want this game plus anything else that I am selling on BGG, I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;ll of course be happy to add other items on in order to save you on shipping! North Carolina residents pay 7% sales tax. Cheers, Jason PS: We have many Osprey books in stock not listed on BGG. The prices are well under publisher rates; if you are interested in them, please let me know!
